name: Hamburger Steaks
description: Savory hamburger patties smothered in a rich onion and bell pepper gravy.
ingredients: Ground beef; Bell peppers; Onions
instructions: Form ground beef into patties; Brown patties in a skillet; Sauté bell peppers and onions; Combine patties and vegetables with gravy and simmer until cooked through.

name: Meatloaf (Faye's)
description: A classic comfort food with a unique flavor from tomato soup and stuffing mix.
ingredients: Ground beef; Stuffing mix; Tomato soup; Egg
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a large bowl; Shape into a loaf and place in a baking dish; Bake until cooked through and firm.

name: Meatloaf (Mavis')
description: A flavorful meatloaf with a tangy ketchup and brown sugar glaze.
ingredients: Ground beef; Onion; Bell pepper; Diced tomatoes; Oats; Egg; Ketchup; Brown sugar; Mustard
instructions: Mix ground beef with vegetables, oats, and egg; Form into a loaf; Prepare a glaze with ketchup, brown sugar, and mustard; Spread glaze over meatloaf before baking.

name: Mexican Chicken Casserole
description: This creamy, cheesy, one-dish meal is a perfect weeknight dinner that’s packed with flavor.
ingredients: Chicken breast; Cream cheese; Rotel; Onion; Shredded cheese; Taco seasoning; Corn/tortilla chips
instructions: Preheat oven; Cook and shred chicken; Combine chicken with cream cheese, Rotel, onion, cheese, and seasoning; Bake until hot and bubbly; Top with crushed chips and bake for a few more minutes.

name: Poppyseed Chicken
description: A rich and savory chicken casserole with a buttery, crunchy Ritz cracker topping.
ingredients: Chicken breast; Poppyseed; Sour cream; Lemon juice; Cream of chicken soup; Ritz crackers; Butter
instructions: Cook and shred chicken; Combine chicken with poppy seeds, sour cream, lemon juice, and cream of chicken soup; Place mixture in a baking dish; Top with crushed Ritz crackers mixed with melted butter; Bake until golden and bubbly.

name: Chicken & Dumplings
description: A comforting, classic chicken and dumplings dish with a flavorful broth.
ingredients: Whole chicken; Flour; Baking soda; Crisco
instructions: Boil a whole chicken to create a rich broth; Shred chicken and set aside; Prepare a dumpling dough with flour, baking soda, and crisco; Drop dumplings into the simmering broth; Cook until dumplings are tender and cooked through.

name: Curry Chicken
description: A simple and delicious Filipino-style curry with tender chicken and creamy coconut milk.
ingredients: Chicken thighs; Coconut milk; Bell pepper; Curry powder; Rice
instructions: Sauté chicken thighs until browned; Add curry powder and bell peppers; Stir in coconut milk and simmer until sauce has thickened; Serve over a bed of steamed rice.

name: Adobo
description: A traditional Filipino dish with chicken stewed in a tangy and savory blend of soy sauce and vinegar.
ingredients: Chicken thighs; White vinegar; Soy sauce; Sugar; Garlic; Onion; Bay leaves; Rice
instructions: Marinate chicken in soy sauce and vinegar with spices; Brown chicken; Simmer chicken with remaining marinade, garlic, onion, and bay leaves until chicken is tender; Serve with steamed rice.

name: Hot Links, Peppers, & Onions
description: A quick and easy stir-fry with spicy hot links, bell peppers, and onions.
ingredients: Hot links; Bell peppers; Onions; Vegetable oil
instructions: Slice hot links, bell peppers, and onions; Sauté vegetables in vegetable oil until soft; Add sliced hot links and cook until browned; Serve hot.

name: Jambalaya
description: A classic one-pot rice dish with a medley of ground beef and vegetables in a flavorful tomato base.
ingredients: Rice; Ground beef; Rotel; Garlic; Onion; Tomato paste; Tomato sauce; Bell pepper; Green onions
instructions: Brown ground beef with onion and garlic; Add bell pepper and cook until soft; Stir in tomato paste, tomato sauce, and Rotel; Add rice and water and simmer until rice is cooked through; Garnish with green onions.

name: Carnitas
description: Tender, crispy Mexican pulled pork perfect for tacos or burritos.
ingredients: Pork shoulder/butt; Taco seasoning; Onions; Cheese dip; Sour cream; Avocados; Lime juice; Shredded cheese; Lettuce; Corn/tortilla chips
instructions: Rub pork shoulder with taco seasoning and onions; Slow cook until pork is tender; Shred pork and pan-fry to create crispy edges; Serve with toppings.

name: Enchiladas
description: Corn tortillas filled with chicken or beef, smothered in enchilada sauce and cheese.
ingredients: Chicken breast or ground beef; Taco seasoning; Onions; Tortillas; Enchilada sauce; Shredded cheese
instructions: Cook chicken or ground beef with onions and taco seasoning; Fill tortillas with the meat mixture; Arrange filled tortillas in a baking dish; Pour enchilada sauce over top and sprinkle with cheese; Bake until cheese is melted and bubbly.

name: Fajitas
description: Sizzling strips of chicken, bell peppers, and onions, served with a variety of toppings.
ingredients: Chicken breast; Taco seasoning; Onions; Bell peppers; Cheese dip; Sour cream; Avocados; Lime juice; Shredded cheese; Lettuce; Corn/tortilla chips
instructions: Slice chicken, bell peppers, and onions; Sauté in a skillet with taco seasoning until tender; Serve sizzling with all the toppings on the side.

name: Street Tacos
description: Authentic-style tacos with tender Philly steak, fresh onions, and cilantro.
ingredients: Philly steak meat; Onions; Cilantro; Tomatoes; Sour cream; Avocados; Lime juice; Tortillas
instructions: Sauté Philly steak meat with onions; Warm tortillas; Assemble tacos with meat, onions, cilantro, and tomatoes; Top with sour cream, avocados, and a squeeze of lime juice.

name: Taco Salad
description: A delicious and customizable salad with seasoned ground beef and all your favorite taco toppings.
ingredients: Ground beef; Taco seasoning; Onions; Cheese dip; Sour cream; Avocados; Lime juice; Shredded cheese; Lettuce; Spanish peanuts; Corn/tortilla chips
instructions: Brown ground beef with onions and taco seasoning; Layer lettuce and other toppings in a bowl; Top with the warm meat and serve with chips.

name: New England Boiled Dinner
description: A hearty, one-pot meal with savory ham and tender vegetables.
ingredients: Ham; Cabbage; Potatoes; Carrots
instructions: Place ham in a large pot with water; Bring to a boil and simmer; Add potatoes, carrots, and cabbage; Cook until all vegetables are tender.

name: Pork Chops & Rice
description: Tender pork chops baked with instant rice and creamy mushroom soup.
ingredients: Pork chops; Instant rice; Cream of mushroom soup
instructions: Brown pork chops; Place rice in a baking dish; Top with pork chops and cream of mushroom soup mixed with water; Bake until pork chops are cooked through and rice is tender.

name: Roast
description: A classic pot roast slow-cooked with carrots, potatoes, and onions for a tender, flavorful meal.
ingredients: Roast; Onions; Potatoes; Carrots; Pot roast packet
instructions: Sear roast on all sides; Place roast in a slow cooker or pot with potatoes, carrots, onions, and seasoning packet; Slow cook until meat is fork-tender.

name: Sausage & Green Beans
description: A quick and savory stir-fry of sausage, green beans, and soy sauce served over rice.
ingredients: Sausage; Green beans; Soy sauce; Rice
instructions: Cook sausage; Add green beans and soy sauce to the skillet; Sauté until green beans are cooked; Serve over a bed of steamed rice.

name: Spaghetti
description: A simple and satisfying spaghetti dish with a rich, seasoned meat sauce.
ingredients: Spaghetti noodles or squash; Ground beef; Spaghetti sauce; Tomato paste; Tomato sauce; Seasoning: salt, pepper, garlic powder, brown sugar, Italian seasoning
instructions: Brown ground beef; Add spaghetti sauce, tomato paste, tomato sauce, and seasonings; Simmer for at least 20 minutes; Serve over cooked spaghetti noodles or squash.

name: Stir Fry
description: A quick and easy stir-fry with chicken and mixed vegetables in a savory sauce.
ingredients: Chicken; Broccoli; Stir-fry sauce; Rice; Soy sauce; Fried rice seasoning packet; Mixed vegetables; Onions
instructions: Cook rice; Sauté chicken until cooked through; Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp; Add stir-fry sauce and seasonings and cook until heated through; Serve over rice.

name: Zucchini Lasagna
description: A low-carb alternative to traditional lasagna, made with zucchini noodles and a cheesy beef filling.
ingredients: Zucchini; Cream cheese; Eggs; Mozzarella cheese; Shredded parmesan; Ground beef; Garlic; Tomato paste; Tomato sauce
instructions: Brown ground beef with garlic; Create a creamy cheese filling by mixing cream cheese, eggs, mozzarella, and parmesan; Slice zucchini thin; Layer zucchini, meat sauce, and cheese filling in a baking dish; Bake until bubbly and golden.

name: BLT
description: A classic sandwich with crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and ripe tomatoes.
ingredients: Bread; Bacon; Sliced cheese; Lettuce; Tomatoes; Mayo
instructions: Cook bacon until crispy; Toast bread; Assemble the sandwich with mayo, lettuce, tomatoes, bacon, and cheese.

name: Breakfast Toasters
description: A warm, cheesy breakfast sandwich with bacon and egg.
ingredients: Bread; Bacon; Eggs; Sliced cheese
instructions: Cook bacon and egg; Toast bread; Assemble the sandwich with bacon, egg, and cheese.

name: Burgers
description: A juicy ground beef burger with classic toppings on a toasted bun.
ingredients: Buns; Ground beef; Onion; Ketchup; Mustard; Mayo; Sliced cheese
instructions: Form ground beef into a patty; Cook to desired doneness; Toast buns; Assemble burger with toppings.

name: Grown-Up Grilled Cheese
description: A gourmet grilled cheese with a mix of cheeses and a hint of Caesar dressing.
ingredients: Bread; Butter; Caesar dressing; Sliced cheddar cheese; Feta cheese; Shredded parmesan cheese
instructions: Butter one side of each slice of bread; Place one slice butter-side down in a skillet; Add cheese and Caesar dressing; Top with the second slice of bread, butter-side up; Grill until golden brown and cheese is melted.

name: Hot Ham & Cheese
description: A warm, satisfying sandwich with ham and melted cheese.
ingredients: Bread; Butter; Ham; Sliced cheese
instructions: Butter bread; Place ham and cheese between bread slices; Pan-fry or grill until cheese is melted.

name: Philly Steaks
description: A classic Philly steak sandwich with provolone cheese, onions, and peppers on a sub roll.
ingredients: Buns; Philly steak; Sliced provolone cheese; Onions; Peppers; Butter; Cavender’s
instructions: Sauté sliced onions and peppers until soft; Add Philly steak to the skillet and cook until done; Top with provolone cheese until melted; Serve on warm buns.

name: Reubens
description: A classic deli sandwich with corned beef, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and Thousand Island dressing on rye bread.
ingredients: Rye bread; Butter; Corned beef; Sliced Swiss cheese; Thousand Island dressing; Sauerkraut
instructions: Butter one side of rye bread slices; Place one slice butter-side down in a skillet; Top with corned beef, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, and Thousand Island dressing; Top with the second slice of bread, butter-side up; Grill until golden brown and cheese is melted.

name: Beef Stew
description: A hearty and comforting beef stew with tender chunks of meat and vegetables.
ingredients: Stew meat; Potatoes; Carrots; Onions; Beef stew packet
instructions: Brown stew meat; Add meat and vegetables to a pot with a beef stew seasoning packet and water; Simmer on low heat until meat is very tender and vegetables are soft.

name: Taco Soup
description: A simple and flavorful soup with a taco twist, topped with cheese and sour cream.
ingredients: Ground beef; Black beans; Pinto beans; Corn; Rotel; Crushed tomatoes; Taco seasoning; Onions; Sour cream; Shredded cheese; Corn/tortilla chips
instructions: Brown ground beef with onions; Drain excess fat; Add all remaining soup ingredients to a large pot and simmer; Top with cheese and sour cream when serving.

name: Chili
description: A rich and savory chili with a blend of seasonings and tomatoes.
ingredients: Ground beef; Chili starter; Onions; Tomato paste; Tomato sauce; Rotel; Crushed tomatoes; Chili seasoning; Shredded cheese; Corn chips
instructions: Brown ground beef and onions; Add all tomato ingredients and seasoning to the pot; Simmer on low heat for at least an hour to let the flavors meld.

name: White Chicken Chili
description: A creamy and hearty chili with chicken and white beans.
ingredients: Chicken breast or whole chicken; Onion; Pinto beans; White chicken chili packet; Shredded cheese; Corn chips
instructions: Cook and shred chicken; Sauté onions; Combine chicken, onions, beans, and seasoning packet in a pot; Simmer until heated through; Top with cheese and corn chips.
